description:
**Fix Overview**:

To obtain the BIOS version and details of your Lenovo device using PowerShell:

1. Open PowerShell with administrative privileges.
2. Execute the following command to retrieve the BIOS version:

```powershell
# Get BIOS version
Get-WmiObject win32_ComputerSystem | Select-Object Manufacturer, Model
Get-WmiObject win32_bios
```

This command will return the manufacturer and model of the computer, along with detailed BIOS information.

**Details**:
- Running these commands will help ensure that you have the latest BIOS version for compatibility and performance. 
- Administrative privileges are required to execute WMI commands. (LLM Synthesized)
